      • saveArea

        public void saveArea(Area area)
        This method sets the modified user and date. It then checks all the open forums for a sort index of 0. (if a sort index on a forum is 0 then it is new). If there is a zero sort index then it increments all the sort indices by one so the new sort index becomes the first without having to rely on the creation date for the sorting.
        Specified by:
        saveArea in interface AreaManager
        Parameters:
        area - Area to save
